StringTable.Label: AllowCustomCivs_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Custom Civilizations in Multiplayer sessions are not moderated. Use caution when allowing the use of Custom Civilizations. Any associated custom ship style set and custom ship designs will be transferred along with the Custom Civilization. Shared Custom Civilizations are not retained after the session.

StringTable.Label: Lobby_Allows_Custom_Civs_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Players may use Custom Civilizations, and the host may choose Custom Civilizations for AI players. Load times may be increased due to needing to synchronize additional data.

StringTable.Label: Lobby_No_Custom_Civs_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Players may not use Custom Civilizations.

StringTable.Label: ShareMyCustomCivs_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Your Custom Civilizations will be accessible to all players in the lobby, allowing them to be selected by other Human and AI players.[BR][BR]Full data and images for a Custom Civilization will not be transmitted to the lobby unless they are used by a player when the game starts.

StringTable.Label: ShowOtherCustomCivs_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Enabling this option allows the use of Custom Civilizations provided by other players.

StringTable.Label: MPShowHumanBattlesInViewer_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Human players will be given the option to watch battles in the viewer when their opponent is a human player. This will increase turn times.

StringTable.Label: BATTLE_VIEWER_DISABLED_AI_BATTLES_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Battle Viewer is only enabled for Human vs Human battles.

StringTable.Label: BATTLE_VIEWER_DISABLED_BY_OPTION_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Battle Viewer is disabled in this session.
